name: Tatooine
description: A harsh desert planet in the Outer Rim controlled by the Hutt clans. The planet also serves as the home of the Boonta Eve Classic Podrace, as well as the hideout for many nefarious criminals.

dialogue.clue: He told me he had a tip on the Boonta Eve race that he was going to put big money on.
dialogue.unknown: I'm afraid I haven't seen anyone like that around here.

dialogue.clue: He asked for tips on keeping sand out of your clothes.
dialogue.unknown: Sorry, no one like that has come through here.

dialogue.clue: He mentioned something a deal he had made with the Hutts.
dialogue.unknown: Haven't seen who you're looking for. Now get lost.

name: Kamino
description: A rainy planet covered in endless oceans, Kamino is an Outer Rim world that exports clones. During the Clone Wars, Kamino served as the Republic's main supplier of clone troopers.

dialogue.clue: He said he was going to need an umbrella where's he headed.
dialogue.unknown: I'm afraid I haven't seen anyone like that around here.

dialogue.clue: He said he was headed for the Outer Rim.
dialogue.unknown: Sorry, no one like that has come through here.

dialogue.clue: The planet he's headed to is controlled by the Republic.
dialogue.unknown: Haven't seen who you're looking for. Now get lost.

name: Bespin
description: A gaseous planet with an economy that revolves around precious gas mining. The most well-known gas mining facility is Cloud City. The gases are produced by giant creatures called Aiwha.

dialogue.clue: He said that he may not be sleeping on solid ground for a while.
dialogue.unknown: I'm afraid I haven't seen anyone like that around here.

dialogue.clue: He mentioned that seeing a live Aiwha was an item on his bucket list.
dialogue.unknown: Sorry, no one like that has come through here.

dialogue.clue: He asked about the current market prices of Tibanna gas.
dialogue.unknown: Haven't seen who you're looking for. Now get lost.

name: Naboo
description: A planet near the border of the Outer Rim that is inhabited by humans called the Naboo and the indigenous amphibian creatures the Gungans. The cities are constructed with classical architecture.

dialogue.clue: He seemed to have an interest in classical architecture.
dialogue.unknown: I'm afraid I haven't seen anyone like that around here.

dialogue.clue: He mentioned something about a tip from some Gungan smugglers he wanted to follow up on.
dialogue.unknown: Sorry, no one like that has come through here.

dialogue.clue: He was looking to buy some scuba gear that could offer protection from hostile sea creatures.
dialogue.unknown: Haven't seen who you're looking for. Now get lost.

name: Coruscant
description: A city-covered planet that features a diverse mix of citizens and culture. It features towering skyscrapers, streams of speeder-filled air traffic, and inner levels that stretch far below the worldâ€™s surface.

dialogue.clue: He said he was looking forward to being back in a big city.
dialogue.unknown: I'm afraid I haven't seen anyone like that around here.

dialogue.clue: He mentioned he was thinking about taking a museum tour at his next destination.
dialogue.unknown: Sorry, no one like that has come through here.

dialogue.clue: He asked for tips on avoiding being questioned by Republic government officials.
dialogue.unknown: Haven't seen who you're looking for. Now get lost.

name: Jedha
description: A desert planet chilled by a permanent winter, Jedha was home to the first civilization to show interest in the nature of the Force. During the Galactic Civil War the planet was devastated by an attack from the newly developed Death Star.

dialogue.clue: Apparently he was headed someplace with a strong heritage around the Jedi.
dialogue.unknown: I'm afraid I haven't seen anyone like that around here.

dialogue.clue: He said he was heading to a cold planet, but not a snowy one.
dialogue.unknown: Sorry, no one like that has come through here.

dialogue.clue: He was asking if I knew anyone in the black market that sold kyber crystals.
dialogue.unknown: Haven't seen who you're looking for. Now get lost.

name: Nal Hutta
description: A marshy bog planet with a hot atmosphere and greasy rain. Known as a center for criminal activity, the planet is primarily controlled by the Hutt clans. The planet is also home to many dangerous creatures.

dialogue.clue: He asked for advice on meeting Hutts.
dialogue.unknown: I'm afraid I haven't seen anyone like that around here.

dialogue.clue: He asked where he could find boots that could keep out swamp water.
dialogue.unknown: Sorry, no one like that has come through here.

dialogue.clue: He wanted weapons that could protect him from dangerous creatures.
dialogue.unknown: Haven't seen who you're looking for. Now get lost.

name: Kessel
description: A noxious mining world where criminals are often sentenced to work in the spice mines. The planet is also a major exporter of unrefined coaxium, a valuable fuel source for starships.

dialogue.clue: He asked about the price of unrefined spice.
dialogue.unknown: I'm afraid I haven't seen anyone like that around here.

dialogue.clue: He asked for an introduction to the Pykes.
dialogue.unknown: Sorry, no one like that has come through here.

dialogue.clue: He said he was going to look into a tip on a big coaxium score.
dialogue.unknown: Haven't seen who you're looking for. Now get lost.

name: Krownest
description: A frigid planet covered in snow and mountains. Krownest is controlled by the Mandalorians, and is goverened by the powerful Wren Clan. Their stronghold is a complex blend of steel, stone and glass.

dialogue.clue: He asked for a book on the Mandalorian language.
dialogue.unknown: I'm afraid I haven't seen anyone like that around here.

dialogue.clue: He said he needed clothes that would protect him from the snow.
dialogue.unknown: Sorry, no one like that has come through here.

dialogue.clue: He was asking if anyone had any dirt on the Wren clan.
dialogue.unknown: Haven't seen who you're looking for. Now get lost.

name: Kashyyyk
description: A densely forested planet famous for its enormous Wroshyr trees. The planet is populated by the Wookies, who implement sophisticated technology into the trees to make their homes.

dialogue.clue: He asked about the best ways to deal with Wookies.
dialogue.unknown: I'm afraid I haven't seen anyone like that around here.

dialogue.clue: He asked for equipment specifically for climbing trees.
dialogue.unknown: Sorry, no one like that has come through here.

dialogue.clue: He seemed interested in the illegal Wroshyr sap trade.
dialogue.unknown: Haven't seen who you're looking for. Now get lost.

name: Felucia
description: A jungle planet filled with various kinds of fungal and plant life. Many creatures such as the jungle rancor can be found here. The diverse landscape provides an abundance of crops to be harvested by the planet's many farming villages.

dialogue.clue: He mentioned he was interesting in learning about the most valuable specimens of plant life.
dialogue.unknown: I'm afraid I haven't seen anyone like that around here.

dialogue.clue: He asked about equipment for traversing jungles.
dialogue.unknown: Sorry, no one like that has come through here.

dialogue.clue: He was asking if any farmers were interested in harboring fugutives.
dialogue.unknown: Haven't seen who you're looking for. Now get lost.
